answers.answer: you may have nerve compression (which prevents adequate sensation) or a systemic problem existing.i would have this checked by a podiatrist to rule out vascular disease, diabetes, or vit b deficiencies.

question: my left toes are num. I cant feel wheather they are cold or hot. what could be my problem? also the back of my neck itiches most of the time I have shaved my hair off thinking it would help but it didnt. The only relief I get is when I pour Hydrogen Peroxide over the back of my neck.
